Title: Best Self
Writer: Michael Schur (created by), Tyler Straessle, Kate Gersten (executive story editor), Cord Jefferson (story editor), Andrew Law (story editor), Daniel Schofield (story editor)
Actors: Kristen Bell, William Jackson Harper, Jameela Jamil, D'Arcy Carden
Plot: Michael gets into a bind; Eleanor has an idea that leads Chidi, Tahani, Jason and even Janet to put their feelings on the line.
